configuration.name: Tools Bundle For Eclipse
configuration.mac-postflight-script:
# Don't forget the quotes, there could be a space... * is for v2.1 or v3-prelude or v3 directories chmod -R a+xrw "$ECLIPSE_TARGET_DIR/glassfishv"* chmod -R a+xrw "$ECLIPSE_TARGET_DIR/dropins"
# Eclipse 3.5 want's to write quite a lot to the install directory chmod -R a+w "$ECLIPSE_TARGET_DIR"
sed -i old 's_/p2_/../p2_g' "$ECLIPSE_TARGET_DIR/configuration/config.ini" # but not this file: chmod a-w "$ECLIPSE_TARGET_DIR/configuration/config.ini"
# fix for https://glassfishplugins.dev.java.net/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=257 chown -R ${USER}:admin "$ECLIPSE_TARGET_DIR/glassfishv"*
